group_1.narration: ―Yachiyo―@Yeah, it's supposed to be@part of your bracelet...
―Tsuruno―@Iroha!@You got it fastened on your arm, right?!
―Iroha―@Yes, I do!@And the gems aren't missing either!
―Sana―@Then is this a different [textYellow:Kimochi]@in front of us...?
―Felicia―@Same— different—@who gives a damn what it is!
―Felicia―@Just smash the shit outta@the [textYellow:Kimochi] 'n nab the stone!
―Ui―@The magic pattern of this [textYellow:Kimochi]@is different from what you have, Sis...!

group_1.progressNarration: [textBlack:A] [textYellow:Kimochi] [textBlack:that was supposed to have]@[textBlack:been defeated had appeared.]
[textBlack:Such unbelievable talk reached the ears]@[textBlack:of Kamihama's Magical Girls far and wide.]

[textBlack:That it looked exactly identical,]@[textBlack:yet it didn't exude any overbearing emotions,]@[textBlack:and its magic felt more similar to a Witch]@[textBlack:than a] [textYellow:Kimochi][textBlack:.]
[textBlack:At first,]@[textBlack:no one believed such a tall tale.]
[textBlack:But then one by one,]@[textBlack:as the number of people who saw it multiplied,]@[textBlack:everyone began searching in earnest.]
[textBlack:The reason, one that each and every]@[textBlack:Magical Girl was telling me, seemed to be...]

group_1.narration: That "if we fight this [textYellow:Kimochi],@we'll get fragments of emotions".

group_1.textCenter: Yes, we've found the [textYellow:Kimochi] in question.
We cannot let them get ahead of us.@Send whoever you can out first!
We have to close the gap here...@I'm no match for them though...
A [textYellow:Kimochi], a being corrupted with impurity.
She is the only one who sees your true colors.
What we're looking for—@this [textYellow:Kimochi] as you call it—
was originally a great big Witch called Eve, right?
That's why with Eve's disappearance,@along with all of its energy,
it scattered a mixture of emotions and impurities@everywhere.

group_1.narration: These rumored [textYellow:Kimochi] as you call them@contain lots of impurities gathered up@and housed inside tiny fragmented crystals.
I may be unable to confirm or deny any of this, buuut...
Maybe because of its impurities@exceeding a certain level,@it formed into what appears to be@identical to a genuine [textYellow:Kimochi].

group_1.textLeft: Now that the details have been brought to light,@we can't let it get away.
Let's all go and take it down!

group_1.textRight: Right, let's start by studying the details of@our enemy that's appeared this time.
